markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rope of Climbing](/Equipment.aspx?ID=743)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 262 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This silk rope measures 50 feet long and is capable of holding up to 3,000 pounds. If the rope is ever cut, only the longest remaining portion retains its magic.

<document level="2" id="action-588" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Rope of Climbing (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 262 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 45 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 5"
pfs="Standard"
>
Rope of Climbing (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 262 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 125 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You can activate the _moderate rope of climbing_ once per hour instead of once per day.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 7"
pfs="Standard"
>
Rope of Climbing (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 262 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 300 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You can activate the _greater rope of climbing_ without any frequency limit.
name: Rope of Climbing (Lesser)
